## Database

Using Firestore from Firebase.

[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#)

Source

```
classDiagram
	User -- Bio : Nested

	User: bio (object)
	User: avatar (string)
	User: joinedAt (date)
	User: updatedAt (date)
	User: username (string)

	Bio: description
	Bio: twitter
	Bio: github
	Bio: youtube
	Bio: linkedin
```
